column4: anyone here know what to do to prevent the latest version of Wine from showing up in the Update Manager so I can continue playing World of Warcraft?
yes but I dont wanna have to put up w/ it tellin me I have ONE update available always
I only want it to let me know when I get updates I should install
you might beable to open synaptic package manager. search for wine and tell it to lock that package :)
